text.section: A dissolved corporation may dispose of the known claims against it by following the procedure described in this section.

For purposes of this section, "claim" shall not include a contingent liability, a claim based on an event occurring after the effective date of dissolution or any liability to the Commonwealth or the United States for any state or federal tax liability.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 142, effective January 1, 1989.
